title: Rifftrax - Star Trek: Generations (1994) - Surround Rifftrax
description:
Star Trek: Generations (1994)
=============================

Riffed By: Mike Nelson and Kevin Murphy
Source: BluRay
Video: 1920x1080 x264
Audio: Track 1: English 5.1 Dolby Digital with Rifftrax in Center Channel
Track 2: English 5.1 Dolby Digital with Rifftrax in Left and Right Surround Channel
Track 3: English 5.1 DTS Original untouched

Subtitles: Yes, multiple


Note: This is a 5.1 Dolby Digital version with Rifftrax. I decoded the DTS soundtrack into 6 channels, mixed the Rifftrax-Track into the Left and Right Surround Channel and then used a Dolby Digital Pro Encoder to create a AC3-Dolby Digital Surround Track to give you the impression to be in a movie theater and someone in the audience behind you is talking. It started as a private experiment with surround sound mixing. Since it took me several hours to get the synch and (more or less) the volume mix right, I share it to save you the hassle.

 <a href="
http://www.rifftrax.com/rifftrax/star-trek-generations" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.rifftrax.com/rifftrax/star-trek-generations</a>

If you like what Mike, Bill and Kevin are doing and you want them to be able to continue, please go to http://www.rifftrax.com and click on "Donate" to donate whatever you think is appropriate. Rifftrax is a small, independent company of 10 people who do this for a living. Thanks.

UMe2
